website_summaries.verdict: Two tables in one with a nesting design. Glossy white tops look great paired with chrome base.
pros: Base area has cross beams and a square frame that enhance the modern design
Chrome metal base is very sturdy
Good price point to receive two tables
cons: Tables are a little short and small compared to some competing models

customer_reviews.title: Love these. They look amazing in a home I ...
customer_reviews.text: Love these. They look amazing in a home I just staged. Would definitely buy again. Very easy to put together. Better quality than expected for price
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: tops look extremely low quality with so many defects, flaws, cracks and imperfections
customer_reviews.text: The edges of the table tops look extremely low quality with so many defects, flaws, cracks and imperfections. I had bought this because I really liked the glossy, sharp look of it in the pictures however in reality looks like a piece of lumber was dunked to a white glossy paint before the wood was sanded, smoothened and treated appropriately. I called in, they asked for pictures, I took pictures of the cracked areas, and sent all the pics to them asking for replacement,they said they will contact their producer, and will get back to me. No one did for months. I called back again. They said they will send replacement, but they never sent them.
customer_reviews.author: renee

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: I really like these tables. They look and great and expensive. The assembly was super easy. I’m 9 months pregnant and I put them together in less than 10 min. They are small so if you have a decent size living room I wouldn’t suggest these. I don’t have much room so they are perfect for my place. They feel pretty sturdy. Only time will tell how they last but overall very happy with the look and feel of them.
customer_reviews.author: Shopaholic

customer_reviews.title: These tables are just adorable. Great quality
customer_reviews.text: These tables are just adorable. Great quality, very light and shiny metal that just looks polished all the time. Super affordable so why not!
customer_reviews.author: Samyatakesover

customer_reviews.title: I'm blown away with the materials and quality of construction
customer_reviews.text: I've owned this table set for over 6 months now and after all this time I just had to come back and write this review because I'm amazed about the overall Quality (with a capital Q)! I'm convinced that these were originally designed for elephant acts at the circus because I think they would support the weight of the animal. Perhaps I'm overstating (a bit), but just attempting to convey my experience. If you're looking for tables that are strong and durable ..... DON'T HESITATE! They're Great!
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Really nice for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Yes these are light weight and I’m sure if you purchased designer they would be very heavy duty. However, these are a beautiful, clean and modern interpretation of the real deal. I love them and so does the rest of the family. Bought two sets. Used the taller as end tables and the smaller I put next to one another as a coffee table and they work like a charm. No issues what so ever. One of them came with a little .5 inch mark on a corner but completely unnoticeable unless you are inspecting it. Otherwise perfect and I love them. Ps- they don’t show cup marks :) bonus!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs.5150

customer_reviews.title: Look More Expensive Than They Are!
customer_reviews.text: Star rating based on product only. The tables look great and are far nicer than their price. They were extremely simple to assemble and they seem sturdy. Packaging wasn't great - they arrived slightly damaged but not enough for me to worry about returning (a crack on the back). The product box had a "this side up" label but the Amazon box it was placed in had no indication for this. The Amazon box was also 3x the size of this product box with just a tiny bit of packing paper so of course it was bouncing around in there and being turned upside-down.
customer_reviews.author: RozieBath

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy good looking set
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as pictured. Easy to assemble. No issues with screws, threading holes, or finish. Table top looks like wood but probably made of heavy weight plastics. It’s really heavy and sturdy. The base is not chrome. It’s plated — which probably will wear over time. If I knew that, I may have not purchased it. It’s a good looking set but curious about how long it’ll last.
customer_reviews.author: Spellbound98

customer_reviews.title: Side tables
customer_reviews.text: Very nice pieces!!! I think it would of been 5 stars for me if both would of been the same size! Regardless I put them as my side tables, only I would notice the difference anyway lol. Reason why I bought them was to match my living room table and it worked!
customer_reviews.author: Ana Deicy

customer_reviews.title: Brautiful and easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: These tables were so easy to assemble, all the tools as well as the floor protectors were included. They look very sophisticated and the nesting makes them perfect for small spaces. Absolutely love them and would buy again if there was ever a need.
customer_reviews.author: bananka

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, sturdy and easy to build
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to build took me about 15 minutes! And they look way more expensive than they are which is a plus! I love them. I’d purchase them gain if I needed them.
customer_reviews.author: Berlyn Paar

customer_reviews.title: They took 20% of my refund!!!
customer_reviews.text: Poor finishing, rude customer service. and they took 20% from refund calming no defects. I have bought returned the first one, and I have order the another one and both of them has defects. Not worth to spend on it, don't buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Shadi Abu Hilal

customer_reviews.title: Love the look of the table
customer_reviews.text: Love the look of the table, quality is a little lower than I’d hoped. Kids have learned it’s a look but don’t touch table
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described. There was one tiny blemish on ...
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described. There was one tiny blemish on the edge of one of the tables, on the white top part but was able to flip it to the back so it's hidden. Wasn't worth the effort to exchange. Fast prime shipping
customer_reviews.author: ShoeOCD

customer_reviews.title: Grogeous and easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.text: I received these tables in 3 days and they looked perfect in my living room. Definitely classy and simple with a clean look.
customer_reviews.author: Missylui

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: I bought these tables thinking that they would look nice in our family room and because of the price it wouldn't matter they got a bit scuffed looking from the hard knocks a house full of kids would give them. I have been pleasantly surprised how much they HAVEN"T scuffed up. They still look brand new and they are used every single day. I have used them at the side of chairs, moved them around when guests have been in, used them as a central coffee table, they have been used without coasters for hot drinks, not a mark on them. Nice tables.
customer_reviews.author: Beealright

customer_reviews.title: Dissapointed
customer_reviews.text: I received this dirty and rusty, it looks like it was a return and they sent it to me. very disappointed. I was looking forward to receiving them after it took a long time to get them and if it wasn’t damaged, dirty it would off been a good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: Looks great with Monarch Coffee table and Monarch Computer Desk
customer_reviews.text: We have two other monarch table tops at home. The nesting tables were very easy to install finished in less than 10 minutes. Make sure if you are matching to get glossy tops.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Tran

customer_reviews.title: Looks great!
customer_reviews.text: The size is perfect for nesting a box-sized storage ottoman underneath. I wasn't a big fan of the X frame on the sides, but it grew on me.
customer_reviews.author: E. Llopis

customer_reviews.title: Perfect affordable table
customer_reviews.text: These tables are good, especially for the price. They are extremely easy to put together and look cute. So far the quality of these tables seems pretty good. They look more expensive than what they cost. They are super easy to keep clean by just wiping them down with a damp cloth. I would highly recommend for anyone who wants an affordable side table.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Practical and Pretty!!!
customer_reviews.text: The price was just as fabulous as these nesting tables! The were easy to put together. And I got them in a fashionable time 3 day!! Love love them
customer_reviews.author: Touchè

customer_reviews.title: you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: somehow my reviews keep getting rejected, but i’m honest AND a verified purchaser. i did not receive the correct item, and the manufacturer was very rude with my replacement. would not recommend. the items were rusged, and the replacements were not correct. eventually, i gave up on replacement parts because the process was too much. i would have purchased a similar style in a local store, but i specifically went online for an easier process. (LOL, i thought!)
customer_reviews.author: shaunni

customer_reviews.title: Cheap.
customer_reviews.text: Got this set month later one of the tables collapsed. Did have anything heavy on it. Put my bag on it and ploop my money was broken on the floor.
customer_reviews.author: Mikey

customer_reviews.title: Look good
customer_reviews.text: Ikea quality, easy to assemble, great for watching TV while eating dinner!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Welch

customer_reviews.title: The table looks great. However it is a very cheap table and ...
customer_reviews.text: The table looks great. However it is a very cheap table and the material is not great. The metal legs came all scratched up, and there was a defective part that did not connect with the screw. I believe that for that price, the table should be of better quality.
customer_reviews.author: International Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Great look for the price! The only bad thing I have to say is that some of the chrome parts (base of table) were scratched and had even some rust even though they were packed in plastic assuming this was done at time of manufacturing the parts. Quality could be a little better but unless you stare closely not very noticeable.
customer_reviews.author: JESSICA SALGADO

customer_reviews.title: Lots of compliments on these tables
customer_reviews.text: Nice look. Easy assembly. Works for our needs. We get a lot of compliments on them, even when people touch them to see if it's real reclaimed wood and discover it's not. Functional in a house full of children, pets and people whom like to entertain.
customer_reviews.author: COgirl

customer_reviews.title: Loving it

customer_reviews.title: Great tables!
customer_reviews.text: Great little tables. Ordered a second pair for the other side of the couch too.

customer_reviews.title: Nothing like the image!!!!

customer_reviews.title: Good product, disappointing quality
customer_reviews.text: Overall, it’s a good looking, sturdy product. However, I received this item with certain damages and a missing screw. I am fairly dissatisfied with the quality control of this product.

customer_reviews.title: Impressive
customer_reviews.text: It looked intimidating to put together at first but this was the easiest furniture I've ever put together and it looks beautiful! Very sleek. I also received this item the next day which was a nice surprise. Highly recommend.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time, good quality, and super easy to assemble. First saw this nesting table set on a big brand store website. Decided to look on Amazon and found the exact item for almost $100 less!

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: The metal is not an X, which is why I bought it but it’s some geometric shape. I’m not sure if the quality yet. Still disappointed it’s not an X because I’m wanting to buy the matching desk/entry table.

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking tables
customer_reviews.text: We separated the tables for each end of our couch. They are nice and solid, easy to assemble. Came in early too! One corner of one of the tables has a little dent in it, but not bad enough to worry about. Beautiful, we got the accent table and coffee table to match too!!

customer_reviews.title: amazing

I can't give a full 5 stars because they arrived with the legs already scratched up inside the packaging. The outside package was not damaged. Overall for the money these are really cute and sturdy tables.
customer_reviews.author: Linds1022

customer_reviews.title: BEST TABLE ONLINE !!
customer_reviews.text: Great tables for the price look great in living room.

customer_reviews.title: The reviews are correct, mine came with already cracked ...

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful pieces

customer_reviews.text: These look beautiful in my living room. The pictures don't do it justice. Assembly was a breeze and they nest perfectly together.

customer_reviews.title: These came in great condition. Nothing was broke or missing
customer_reviews.text: These came in great condition. Nothing was broke or missing. It was easy to assemble, except the instructions only had a picture. When assembling, be sure to use the shorter screws for the legs and the longer screws for the 2 bars. Other than that, the product is well made. I'm using it as side tables for the master bed.
customer_reviews.author: Cinterest

customer_reviews.title: SOLID and MODERN
customer_reviews.text: These tables are solid and well made for the money and add a modern touch to your decor! I love mine and they are versatile and can be moved to exactly where you want them to go!

product_meta.title: Monarch Specialties , Nesting Table, Chrome Metal, Glossy White, Table Set, 2 pcs
product_meta.description: Color:WhiteWith its chic glossy white tops, this 2 piece nesting table set gives an exceptional look to any room. The stylish criss-cross chrome metal base and sides provide sturdy support with a contemporary look. Use this multi- functional set as end tables, lamp tables, decorative display tables, or simply as accent pieces.
feature_bullets: Multi-functional set can be used as end table, display tables or simply as accent pieces
Modern chrome metal "X" base offers great support
Spacious glossy white table tops with a criss-cross chrome metal base for support
Contemporary design blends well with most decors

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars413 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
